channel.title: Commad thing help pleas
channel.description:
Hello
1.How do you get it in runescape 2 it say update in ... 54 seconde .. like that timer
How do i get that into moparscape If i can get it onto moparscape. Can somone make a command for it so when i command on ::update it will do the timer thing. intill it gets to 0 the sever well go down
2.And its there any thing that it will rebot the sever it self every 30mins if can send me link

item.title: Commad thing help pleas
item.dc:creator: @gign919191 gign919191
item.description:
@gign919191 wrote:

[code] if ((playerRights >= 2) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“your name”)) {

		if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) {
			PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
			PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
			PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
			PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
		}

[/code]

There you go. Hope that helps

Read full topic
